name: imwave, inc.
tag_list: sem, search-engine-marketing, search-agency, search-marketing-agency, search-engine-marketing-agency, performance-sem, performance-search-engine-marketing, performance-search-agency, performance-search-marketing-agency
overview:
imwave is a performance search engine advertising agency.

imwave builds, manages, and funds the search marketing campaigns for clients. Sales and/or leads are tracked through recognized 3rd party tracking systems and clients only pay for the sales and leads that imwave generates.
